metrics.description: a description of the performance metric
metrics.baseline: a description of a relevant baseline for the metric

system.problem-type: a description of the ML problem type (should this be an enumeration?)
system.task: a description of the ML task
system.usage-context: a description of the model usage context
system.fp-risk: a description of the risks of producing a false positive
system.fn-risk: a descriptionk of the risks of producing a false negative
system.other-risks: a description of the other risks of producing incorrect results

data.description: a description of this data source
data.source: a description of where this data is coming from
data.classification: a description of the data classification level (enumeration)
data.access: a description of how the data in question is accessed

labels.percentage: a description of the frequency with which this label occurs

schema.name: the name of the field
schema.type: a description of the field type
schema.expected-values: an example of an expected value for the field
schema.missing-values: an example of a missing value for the field
schema.special-values: an example of a missing value for the field

data.rights: a description of the ways in which the data can / cannot be used
data.policies: a description of the policies that govern use of this data (if applicable)
data.identifiable-information: a description of personally-identifiable information considerations

resources.gpu: a description of the GPU resources necessary for model development
resources.cpu: a description of the CPU resources necessary for model development
resources.memory: a description of the memory (RAM) resources necessary for model development
resources.storage: a description of the model storage requirements

environment.integration: a description of the manner in which the model is integrated into the system
environment.output: a description of the model output specification

resources.gpu: a description of the GPU resources necessary for model inference
resources.cpu: a description of the CPU resources necessary for model inference
resources.memory: a description of the memory (RAM) resources necessary for model inference
resources.storage: a description of the model storage requirements
